content:

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of UkraineAs of 25.03.24.
title: The Armed Forces destroyed 11 Russian tanks in a day and put more than 600 invaders
author: Army Inform
